title: Messages won't download
content:
For the last couple of days I have been having multiple issues with my messaging. When friends/family send long texts or images it says that I must download but then never does. In group texts I have also gotten the messages in the wrong order and much later than they were originally sent. 

I have tried force stopping and cleaning out the cache but nothing has worked. And now because it does not download it says I have unread messages. 

Anyone else having this issue? Any advice on how to fix it?
